title: Lead by Design: Experiential Learning Collaborative
description: Students work in teams to develop a template for a 10-week-long engineering design project. Teaches teamwork, leadership skills, inclusive team practices, Agile process, engineering ethics, and identity formation in engineers.

pre_req_data.text: Enrollment is restricted to juniors and seniors.

class_notes: Enroll in lecture and associated discussion section. Please contact the instructor for permission to enroll
